MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the LL16 postcode area of Denbigh, affecting properties in Brookhouse Road, Whitchurch Road and surrounding streets. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 5.08PM. Our engineers have arrived on site to investigate the cause of the fault. Our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible. We expect the power to be restored by 7.15PM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 6.12PM on 13th December 2020.
